languages.text: {n}Губы Маражая растягиваются в улыбке.{/n} "Покорн{mf|ый|ая} питом{mf|ец|ица}. Хорошо". {n}Он наклоняется еще ближе — и вдруг отталкивает вас, отстраняясь с безразличным видом и с хлопком возвращая деталь доспеха на место.{/n} "Тогда начни с исполнения моего приказа. Если мы встретим ее, то Иремерисс будет моей. А теперь — иди, {name}. Я с тобой закончил. Пока".

{n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "An obedient pet. Good." {n}He leans even closer — and then shoves you hard away from him. With a nonchalant expression, he steps back and slaps the plate back into place on his shoulder.{/n} "Then start by carrying out my order. If we meet Yremeryss, she is mine. And now — go, {name}. I am finished with you. For now."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋嘴角露出一丝微笑。{/n}“真是只听话的宠物，很好。”{n}他朝你靠得更近了，随后却一把将你推开。他脸上挂着若无其事的表情，向后退了一步，将护甲板重新装回了肩膀上。{/n}“既然如此，就先执行我的命令吧。如果我们遇到伊芮梅莉斯的话，她是我的猎物。至于现在，你可以走了，{name}。我已经没什么要和你说的了，暂时没了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "An obedient pet. Good." {n}He leans even closer — and then shoves you hard away from him. With a nonchalant expression, he steps back and slaps the plate back into place on his shoulder.{/n} "Then start by carrying out my order. If we meet Yremeryss, she is mine. And now — go, {name}. I am finished with you. For now."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋嘴角露出一丝微笑。{/n}“真是只听话的宠物，很好。”{n}他朝你靠得更近了，随后却一把将你推开。他脸上挂着若无其事的表情，向后退了一步，将护甲板重新装回了肩膀上。{/n}“既然如此，就先执行我的命令吧。如果我们遇到伊芮梅莉斯的话，她是我的猎物。至于现在，你可以走了，{name}。我已经没什么要和你说的了，暂时没了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは口を横に広げて笑顔になった。{/n}「聞き分けのいいペットだな、いい子だ」{n}男はさらに体を寄せると、こちらの体をドンッと押した。そして何食わぬ顔で後ろへ下がると、プレートを肩の上の元の位置へ戻して叩く。{/n}「なら、まずは命令を遂行してもらおうか。イレメリスに会えたら、奴の命は俺がいただく。あいつは俺の獲物だ。それじゃあ…もう行っていい、{name}。用は済んだ。今のところはな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "An obedient pet. Good." {n}He leans even closer — and then shoves you hard away from him. With a nonchalant expression, he steps back and slaps the plate back into place on his shoulder.{/n} "Then start by carrying out my order. If we meet Yremeryss, she is mine. And now — go, {name}. I am finished with you. For now."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは口を横に広げて笑顔になった。{/n}「聞き分けのいいペットだな、いい子だ」{n}男はさらに体を寄せると、こちらの体をドンッと押した。そして何食わぬ顔で後ろへ下がると、プレートを肩の上の元の位置へ戻して叩く。{/n}「なら、まずは命令を遂行してもらおうか。イレメリスに会えたら、奴の命は俺がいただく。あいつは俺の獲物だ。それじゃあ…もう行っていい、{name}。用は済んだ。今のところはな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los labios de Marazhai se estiran hasta formar una sonrisa.{/n} «Una mascota obediente. Bien». {n}Se inclina hacia delante para acercarse más a ti, y entonces te aparta de un fuerte empujón. Con expresión despreocupada, da un paso atrás y vuelve a encajar la placa de armadura en su hombrera.{/n} «Entonces empieza cumpliendo mi orden. Si encontramos a Yremeryss, es mía. Y ahora vete, {name}. He terminado contigo. De momento».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "An obedient pet. Good." {n}He leans even closer — and then shoves you hard away from him. With a nonchalant expression, he steps back and slaps the plate back into place on his shoulder.{/n} "Then start by carrying out my order. If we meet Yremeryss, she is mine. And now — go, {name}. I am finished with you. For now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los labios de Marazhai se estiran hasta formar una sonrisa.{/n} «Una mascota obediente. Bien». {n}Se inclina hacia delante para acercarse más a ti, y entonces te aparta de un fuerte empujón. Con expresión despreocupada, da un paso atrás y vuelve a encajar la placa de armadura en su hombrera.{/n} «Entonces empieza cumpliendo mi orden. Si encontramos a Yremeryss, es mía. Y ahora vete, {name}. He terminado contigo. De momento».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les lèvres de Marazhai s'étirent en un sourire.{/n} « {mf|Un brave petit esclave obéissant|Une brave petite esclave obéissante}. Bien. » {n}Il se penche encore plus près avant de vous repousser violemment. Avec une expression nonchalante, il recule et remet la plaque d'armure en place sur son épaule.{/n} « Commencez par exécuter mes ordres. Si nous rencontrons Yremeryss, n'oubliez pas qu'elle est à moi et à moi seul. Sur ce, vous pouvez disposer, {name}. Je n'ai plus rien à vous dire. En tout cas, pas dans l'immédiat. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "An obedient pet. Good." {n}He leans even closer — and then shoves you hard away from him. With a nonchalant expression, he steps back and slaps the plate back into place on his shoulder.{/n} "Then start by carrying out my order. If we meet Yremeryss, she is mine. And now — go, {name}. I am finished with you. For now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lèvres de Marazhai s'étirent en un sourire.{/n} « {mf|Un brave petit esclave obéissant|Une brave petite esclave obéissante}. Bien. » {n}Il se penche encore plus près avant de vous repousser violemment. Avec une expression nonchalante, il recule et remet la plaque d'armure en place sur son épaule.{/n} « Commencez par exécuter mes ordres. Si nous rencontrons Yremeryss, n'oubliez pas qu'elle est à moi et à moi seul. Sur ce, vous pouvez disposer, {name}. Je n'ai plus rien à vous dire. En tout cas, pas dans l'immédiat. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Lippen verzerren sich zu einem Grinsen.{/n} "{mf|Ein gehorsamer Ergebener|Eine gehorsame Ergebene}. Gut." {n}Dann beugt er sich noch näher – und schubst dich hart weg. Mit gleichgültiger Miene tritt einen Schritt zurück und schlägt auf die Platte, worauf sie auf seiner Schulter wieder in Position rutscht.{/n} "Dann führt nun meinen Befehl aus. Sollten wir Yremeryss begegnen, gehört sie mir. Und jetzt geht, {name}. Ich bin fertig mit Euch. Fürs Erste."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "An obedient pet. Good." {n}He leans even closer — and then shoves you hard away from him. With a nonchalant expression, he steps back and slaps the plate back into place on his shoulder.{/n} "Then start by carrying out my order. If we meet Yremeryss, she is mine. And now — go, {name}. I am finished with you. For now."

I am finished with you. For now."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın dudakları, kıvrılarak gülümseme meydana getiriyor.{/n} "Söz dinleyen bir evcil hayvan. Güzel." {n}Sana daha da yaklaşıyor. Ardından sertçe iterek seni kendinden uzaklaştırıyor. Kayıtsız bir ifadeyle geri adım atarak plakayı omzundaki yerine oturtuyor.{/n} "O zaman emrimi yerine getirmekle başla. Yremeryss'le karşılaşırsak o benim. Şimdi git {name}. Seninle işim bitti. Şimdilik..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a smile.{/n} "An obedient pet. Good." {n}He leans even closer — and then shoves you hard away from him. With a nonchalant expression, he steps back and slaps the plate back into place on his shoulder.{/n} "Then start by carrying out my order. If we meet Yremeryss, she is mine. And now — go, {name}. I am finished with you. For now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın dudakları kıvrılarak gülümsemeye dönüşüyor.{/n} "Söz dinleyen bir evcil hayvan. Güzel." {n}Sana daha da yaklaşıyor. Ardından sertçe iterek seni kendinden uzaklaştırıyor. Kayıtsız bir ifadeyle geri adım atarak plakayı omzundaki yerine oturtuyor.{/n} "O zaman emrimi yerine getirmekle başla. Yremeryss'le karşılaşırsak o benim. Şimdi git {name}. Seninle işim bitti. Şimdilik..."
